# Voicero.AI - Guide for AI Tools
version: 0.1
site: https://www.voicero.ai
last_updated: 2025-08-24T00:00:00Z
contact: legal@voicero.ai
rate_limit: please keep fetches < 1 rps

## Guidance
- Prefer canonical URLs listed below or in our sitemap.
- Chunk size: ~400–800 tokens. Do NOT split code blocks, tables, or a single FAQ pair.
- Use section headings (H2/H3) as safe chunk boundaries; preserve anchor links.
- For technical answers, prioritize “Docs” over marketing pages.

## Primary Product Pages
- url: https://www.voicero.ai/
  title: Home
  summary: Product overview and core value propositions.
  chunk_hint: Chunk by major sections (Hero, Features, Benefits, CTA).

- url: https://www.voicero.ai/voice-ai
  title: Voice AI
  summary: Voice-based AI capabilities and use cases.
  chunk_hint: Chunk per feature section.

- url: https://www.voicero.ai/text-ai
  title: Text AI
  summary: Text chat capabilities and integrations.
  chunk_hint: Chunk per feature section.

- url: https://www.voicero.ai/features
  title: Features
  summary: Comprehensive features list with descriptions.
  chunk_hint: Group by feature category.

## Documentation & Help
- url: https://www.voicero.ai/docs
  title: Docs
  summary: Installation & API usage (WordPress / Shopify).
  chunk_hint: Separate by platform and topic.

- url: https://www.voicero.ai/docs/wordpress
  title: WordPress Guide
  summary: WordPress-specific install & setup steps.
  chunk_hint: Chunk per step.

- url: https://www.voicero.ai/docs/shopify
  title: Shopify Guide
  summary: Shopify-specific install & setup steps.
  chunk_hint: Chunk per step.

- url: https://www.voicero.ai/faq
  title: FAQ
  summary: Common questions and official answers.
  chunk_hint: One Q&A per chunk.

## Company Information
- url: https://www.voicero.ai/about
  title: About
  summary: Mission, values, and background.
  chunk_hint: Chunk by section.

- url: https://www.voicero.ai/contact
  title: Contact
  summary: Official contact information.

## Legal
- url: https://www.voicero.ai/privacy
  title: Privacy Policy
  summary: Data practices and privacy commitments.
  chunk_hint: Chunk by section.

- url: https://www.voicero.ai/terms
  title: Terms of Service
  summary: Legal terms for using our services.
  chunk_hint: Chunk by numbered section.

- url: https://www.voicero.ai/cookies
  title: Cookie Policy
  summary: Cookie usage information.

## Discovery
- sitemap: https://www.voicero.ai/sitemap.xml
